description:
If you live in the greater Chicago metro area and you suffered an injury or loss as the result of someone else's negligence or wrongdoing, you deserve the best personal injury advocate on your side to help you resolve your matter and obtain the maximum amount of compensation for the damages you incurred.

From our law office in downtown Chicago, the attorneys at Power Rogers represent the rights and entitlements of innocent accident victims and their families adversely affected by car accidents, truck accidents, medical malpractice, birth injuries, slip-and-fall accidents, and all other types of preventable tragedies.

Our attorneys possess decades of combined legal experience, and since 2000, our law firm has recovered over $4 billion in total compensation for our plaintiff clients, an astounding accomplishment that far exceeds what other injury practices in the region have achieved.

As further evidence of our success, each of our founding partners have earned recognition from The Best Lawyers in America as well as numerous other awards and honors for our professionalism and service, and Chicago Lawyer magazine voted our practice as the "No. 1 Plaintiff's Law Firm" for the past eight years.

This means you can expect to receive the highest level of advocacy and support from a local attorney who is totally devoted to your needs and helping you obtain the most favorable outcome possible. For more information about how Power Rogers can best help you and your family through your difficult and uncertain time, you can call our law office or visit our website to schedule a free initial consultation, and we will not require a fee from you unless we obtain compensation on your behalf.
